While the qualitative analysis regarding the wide moat and strategic spin-off of the Mobility business is coherent and well-supported by citations, these quantitative mismatches force the reader to reconcile the core valuation argument themselves. The transitions between sections are generally smooth, but the failure to align the base-case narrative with the primary financial table undermines the report's overall consistency.
